attributes.action: Change the law regarding Euthanasia in this country to stop human suffering.
attributes.additional_details:
Suffering of terminally ill humans is something that we could do something about, but in this country, we choose to watch them suffer instead. If a dog is terminally ill, they are put to sleep. This is considered to be the kinder option to avoid suffering. This is an attitude that the doctors of this country, as well as the vets, should be allowed to take, under strict rules and guidelines, of course.
Its time to change the law regarding euthanasia and stop the suffering of a great many people
attributes.background: I want the government to debate and change the law on Euthanasia, to make it possible, under strict rules and guidelines, for terminally ill suffering people to be able to end their lives with dignity. Too many people are put through what can only be described as cruelty and this needs to stop
